summary: The module defines a dataset class that acts as a thin wrapper around an in‑memory dataset managed by a multiprocessing SyncManager. It forwards attribute access to the underlying dataset and supplies helper methods for describing the dataset, checking its existence, loading, saving, and configuring the manager.
business_intent: Enable efficient inter‑process data exchange in Kedro pipelines by providing a shared‑memory backed dataset, reducing I/O overhead and simplifying coordination between parallel tasks.
